summary: Katherine is a typical teenager. Today's her funeral. The four adults in her life have a lot on their mind - and it's not all about Katherine either. With a frankness that's strikingly disarming as well as frequently self-serving, the grown-ups struggle with being... well... grown-up.
cast: Barbara Hershey|Joe Mantegna|Diane Venora|James Naughton|Natalie Dreyfuss|Jordan Baker|Randy Crowder|Amanda Kinsley|William Trump|Scott F. Anderson|Heather Brooker|Tony Nowicki|Abigail Rose Solomon|Trevor Trout|Ryan Van de Kamp Buchanan
title: Childless
